name: Nymphomania Nightmare
description:
[Synopsis]
Suddenly, the succubus army attacked Elstacia, the land of sword skills.
The main character, the magic swordfighter, Luke, plays the succubus Eva, who is the main character.
I'll hunt down to one more step with my friends,
I was taken into the world of lustful dreams by being struck by a momentary ski.

The stage of the dream is a magic school ... While breaking through various enemies and traps
The purpose is to find and defeat Eva in order to return to reality.

Can Luke return to reality?
And can we rescue the companions who were taken to the world of lewd dreams together?
Bad end only RPG for M without reverse rape and reverse.

In addition, a new system has been installed from this time.
[Corruption system]
Colored characters on the map and battle characters,
The main character is watered down or bad skill,

A character who thinks he is an ally may be a trap that invites fall.
